TextView.android:text: Dr. P. Jayarami Reddy, the Director of the College, is a rare combination of a popular teacher, a famous researcher and an able administrator. To a great extent GPREC owes its name and fame to this stalwart academician. Under his stewardship, discipline and academic excellence have become the hallmarks of GPREC. He is one of the Triumvirate of GPREC (1.Sri G.Pulla Reddy, the Founder Chairman 2. Sri R V Seshacharlu, the Founder Treasure 3. Dr.P.Jaya Rami Reddy, the Director), who have meticulously prepared the frame work for the development of the institution and put a vibrant system in place. He is the longest serving (30 years) Principal/Director of an engineering college in Andhra Pradesh. It is not surprising that Dr.Jaya Rami Reddyâ€™s name has become synonymous with GPREC.

Dr.Sreenivas Reddy, the Principal of the college, is known to be a hard task master and represents the youthful exuberance of the institution. Dr.B.Sreenivasa Reddy received his Ph.D in Mechanical Engineering from Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Hyderabad in 1998. After obtaining masters degree from Birla Institute of Technology and Science, Pilani, he joined the faculty of Mechanical Engineering of GPREC 1990 and has been serving the institute since then. He headed the department of Mechanical Engineering as a professor from 2000 and 2007. He served the institute as Dean, Academics and Administration from 2006 to 2007. He took over as the Principal of the college after Dr.Jaya Rami Reddy became the Director of the college in 2007. With his wide experience in teaching and administration, Prof. Sreenivasa Reddy is striving hard to take the college to new heights. Open to change and innovation, with ready willingness to adopt and experiment new ideas, he tries out the best practices from around and assimilates them, thus giving the institution a competitive edge.
